# tailor_platform_machine_user (Data Source)

The platform_machine_user data source provides information about a controlplane machine user.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "tailor_platform_machine_user" "org_admin" {
  name            = "<machine_user_name>"
  organization_id = "<organization_id>"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the machine user to look up.
- `organization_id` (String) The ID of the organization where the machine user exists.

### Optional

- `folder_id` (String) The ID of the folder where the machine user exists (optional).

### Read-Only

- `client_id` (String) The client ID of the machine user.
- `client_secret` (String, Sensitive) The client secret of the machine user. This is a sensitive value.
- `description` (String) The description of the machine user.
- `id` (String) The ID of the machine user.
